statements: SELECT * FROM Students
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT student_name, overall_gpa FROM Students ORDER BY overall_gpa DESC
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT student_name, graduation_date FROM Students ORDER BY graduation_date
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE overall_gpa > 3.5 ORDER BY student_name DESC
SELECT student_name, overall_gpa, enrollment_date FROM Students WHERE graduation_date IS NULL
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY student_id
SELECT student_name, graduation_date FROM Students WHERE overall_gpa < 3.0 ORDER BY graduation_date ASC
SELECT * FROM StudentProgression WHERE id = 1;
SELECT student_id, progress FROM StudentProgression WHERE achieved_marks > 80;
SELECT * FROM EducationalPlanning WHERE planning_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgression ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT planning_id, planning_name FROM EducationalPlanning WHERE decision_making = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM StudentProgression ORDER BY student_id ASC, achieved_marks DESC;
SELECT student_id, progress FROM StudentProgression WHERE achieved_marks > 80;
SELECT id, planning_name FROM EducationalPlanning WHERE decision_making = 'Approved' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT student_id, MAX(achieved_marks) AS highest_marks FROM StudentProgression GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT sp.student_id, ep.planning_name FROM StudentProgression sp INNER JOIN EducationalPlanning ep ON sp.student_id = ep.id;
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE class_id = 101
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC
SELECT student_name, class_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id
SELECT class_name, COUNT(student_id) as student_count FROM classes JOIN students ON classes.class_id = students.class_id GROUP BY class_name
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT class_name, teacher_id FROM classes WHERE teacher_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY class_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE student_grade = 'A';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(grade) AS num_of_grades FROM grades GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_of_grades > 3 ORDER BY num_of_grades DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, subject, marks FROM student_progress WHERE subject = 'Math';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses WHERE department = 'Computer Science';
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM student_progress sp JOIN enrollments e ON sp.student_id = e.student_id WHERE e.course_id = 101;
SELECT report_id, student_name, grade FROM student_progress sp JOIN reports r ON sp.student_id = r.student_id WHERE r.grade = 'A';
SELECT student_id, student_name, subject, marks FROM student_progress WHERE marks > 80 ORDER BY marks DESC
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, department FROM courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY course_name
SELECT student_name, subject, marks FROM student_progress WHERE marks BETWEEN 60 AND 70 AND subject = 'Math'
SELECT * FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY student_id, course_id
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM student_progress sp JOIN reports r ON sp.student_id = r.student_id AND sp.marks > 90 ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT course_id, course_name, teacher FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM grades WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT student_name, report_date, report_content FROM students, reports WHERE students.student_id = reports.student_id;
SELECT student_name, grade_level, gender FROM students WHERE grade_level = '10th' ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, teacher, COUNT(enrollment_id) AS num_enrollments FROM courses INNER JOIN enrollments ON courses.course_id = enrollments.course_id GROUP BY course_name, teacher;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN courses ON grades.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT student_id, MIN(grade) AS min_grade, MAX(grade) AS max_grade, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM grades GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(grade) > 2;

SELECT student_name, report_date, report_content FROM students INNER JOIN reports ON students.student_id = reports.student_id WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
